title: How to Watch an Entire YouTube Playlist in VLC

steps.title: Ensure that VLC is up-to-date.
steps.content: Ensure that VLC is up-to-date. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Download the YouTube Playlist Parser add-on for VLC.
steps.content: Download the YouTube Playlist Parser add-on for VLC . Once you hit the "Download" button, you will be redirected to a text file. Simply right click and click on "Save As".

steps.title: When you save the file, ensure that you save it with the extension ".lua".
steps.content: When you save the file, ensure that you save it with the extension ".lua". Now move that saved file to a proper folder depending on your OS : [2] X Research source Windows : %ProgramFiles%\VideoLAN\VLC\lua\playlist\ Linux : /usr/lib/vlc/lua/playlist/ Mac OS X : /Applications/VLC.app/Contents/MacOS/share/lua/playlist/

steps.title: Find your desired YouTube playlist and copy its URL.
steps.content: Find your desired YouTube playlist and copy its URL. [3] X Research source Paste the URL in the "Open Network Window". [4] X Research source The first video will start playing and all the others will queue up.
